title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Abby
itunes:title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Abby
description:
Morgan and Abby talk about the latest things going on in their personal lives. They also discuss the things they learned from the Meat Scientist and any updates on Abby’s stolen money.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
